about-me.title: About Me
about-me.first-text: Hi, I’m a German-speaking frontend developer based near Düsseldorf. Driven by the endless possibilities in IT, I love creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites and applications.
about-me.location-text: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Mönchengladbach and remotely.
about-me.lightbulb-text: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about-me.puzzle-text: To me, programming is more than just writing code – it’s a creative way to solve problems. I enjoy turning complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions, helping you bring your goals and visions to life.

my-skills.title: My skills
my-skills.first-text: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
my-skills.second-text: Feel free to contact me. I’d love to keep expanding my knowledge.

my-portfolio.title: Portfolio
my-portfolio.first-text: Check out a selection of my work here – dive into the projects to see my skills in action.
my-portfolio.pokedex-text: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
my-portfolio.elp-text: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen
my-portfolio.join-text: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
my-portfolio.dabubble-text: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

my-contact.title: Contact
my-contact.first-text: Reach out via this form – I’m excited to hear from you, learn about your ideas, and contribute to your projects with my work.
my-contact.privacy-text: I've read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
